snippet.title: DreadEye VR Launching Trailer
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/692930/DreadEye_VR/

1. Follow instructions - Consult the book for step-by-step methods to summon spirits.
2. Cook ingredients - Use the bowl to prepare ritual ingredients that require it.
3. Reset when necessary - If things get messy, use the hourglass to think it over and start again from scratch.
4. Summon the ghost - Complete the ritual and call upon the restless dead.
5. Find the ghost - Use your flashlight to illuminate the ghost.
6. Commune with the dead - Enter the spiritual world and endure the horror.

www.dreadvr.com
